845G chipset I believe. I forgot it, and forgot the command to check that too
mate, I was on Jaunty and I just moved to Karmic and the difference is night and day on my GMA 950
VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation 82845G/GL[Brookdale-G]/GE Chipset Integrated Graphics Device
so yours is crap and mine is boosted crap
the Intel drivers have undergone rapid development between the release of Jaunty and Karmic.  Karmic includes the latest versions, 2.8.0.  Jaunty is on 2.6.3.
glxgears frame rate has gone to five times the speed for me now, no joke.
And I used to get screen flickering and switching on and off when changing video modes.  Not any more.
Karmic has some bugs.  Apps crash regularly.  But they crash cleanly.
ok, yeah. I had some crashes yester5day after the install, but now I really haven't had much of them. Well, maybe i'm not using enough features :)
I trust that they'll fix all the major bugs before release
I've filed plenty of bug reports myself
but the Intel driver support is *so* much better.  And the Mac support is better too.
